scene.name: Elyptica Spaceport's Terminal 21
scene.summary: You stumble out of your shuttle into the Elyptica spaceport. It was a rough ride. You spent all your credits on that shuttle, you only have a small amount left. You should get your bearings and figure out how to get out of this joint.
scene.ambient: You shuffle restlessly under the somewhat dim electric lights.

scene.name: Spaceport Center
scene.summary: It wasn't very hard to find the bustling, central core of the spaceport. This place must be small. Around you are a number of shops, as well as halls to all the terminals.
scene.ambient: The bustle makes you nervous, but the food in the shops makes you salivate.

scene.name: The Spaceport Bathroom
scene.summary: It's remarkably well taken care of. You didn't think cleaning bots had gotten this advanced.
scene.ambient: It kinda stinks in here, and you don't really have to go to the bathroom.
